chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: R -> R
b: R
a: R
n: nat

Goal:
subdivision (SF_inf_r f a b n) = (if Rle_dec a b then seq2Rlist (unif_part a b n) else seq2Rlist (unif_part b a n))

Premises:
SF_inf_r : (R -> R) -> forall a b : R, nat -> StepFun a b
subdivision : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> Rlist
unif_part = fun (a b : R) (n : nat) => mkseq (fun i : nat => a + INR i * (b - a) / (INR n + 1)) (S (S n)) : R -> R -> nat -> seq R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
Rle_dec : forall r1 r2 : R, {r1 <= r2} + {~ r1 <= r2}
seq2Rlist = fix seq2Rlist (s : seq R) : Rlist := match s with | [::] => nil | h :: t => cons h (seq2Rlist t) end : seq R -> Rlist Argument scope is [seq_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
SF_sup_subdiv : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), subdivision (SF_sup_r f a b n) = (if Rle_dec a b then seq2Rlist (unif_part a b n) else seq2Rlist (unif_part b a n))
SF_val_subdiv : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), subdivision (sf_SF_val_fun f a b n) = (if Rle_dec a b then seq2Rlist (unif_part a b n) else seq2Rlist (unif_part b a n))
SF_val_subdiv_val : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), subdivision_val (sf_SF_val_fun f a b n) = (if Rle_dec a b then seq2Rlist (SF_val_ly f a b n) else seq2Rlist (SF_val_ly f b a n))
SF_sup_subdiv_val : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), subdivision_val (SF_sup_r f a b n) = (if Rle_dec a b then seq2Rlist (behead (pairmap (fun x y : R => Sup_fct f x y) 0 (unif_part a b n))) else seq2Rlist (behead (pairmap (fun x y : R => Sup_fct f x y) 0 (unif_part b a n))))
ad_SF_val_fun : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), (a <= b -> adapted_couple (SF_val_fun f a b n) a b (seq2Rlist (unif_part a b n)) (seq2Rlist (SF_val_ly f a b n))) /\ (~ a <= b -> adapted_couple (SF_val_fun f b a n) a b (seq2Rlist (unif_part b a n)) (seq2Rlist (SF_val_ly f b a n)))
unif_part_nat : forall (a b : R) (n : nat) (x : R), a <= x <= b -> {i : nat | nth 0 (unif_part a b n) i <= x < nth 0 (unif_part a b n) (S i) /\ (S (S i) < size (unif_part a b n))%nat} + {nth 0 (unif_part a b n) n <= x <= nth 0 (unif_part a b n) (S n)}
SF_inf_fun = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) (x : R) => if Rle_dec a b then SF_fun (SF_inf_seq f a b n) 0 x else SF_fun (SF_inf_seq f b a n) 0 x : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> nat -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope R_scope]
SF_sup_fun = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) (x : R) => if Rle_dec a b then SF_fun (SF_sup_seq f a b n) 0 x else SF_fun (SF_sup_seq f b a n) 0 x : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> nat -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope R_scope]
unif_part_sort : forall (a b : R) (n : nat), a <= b -> sorted Rle (unif_part a b n)
ad_SF_inf_r : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), (a <= b -> adapted_couple (fun x : R => SF_inf_fun f a b n x) a b (seq2Rlist (unif_part a b n)) (seq2Rlist (behead (pairmap (fun x y : R => Inf_fct f x y) 0 (unif_part a b n))))) /\ (~ a <= b -> adapted_couple (fun x : R => SF_inf_fun f a b n x) a b (seq2Rlist (unif_part b a n)) (seq2Rlist (behead (pairmap (fun x y : R => Inf_fct f x y) 0 (unif_part b a n)))))
ad_SF_sup_r : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), (a <= b -> adapted_couple (fun x : R => SF_sup_fun f a b n x) a b (seq2Rlist (unif_part a b n)) (seq2Rlist (behead (pairmap (fun x y : R => Sup_fct f x y) 0 (unif_part a b n))))) /\ (~ a <= b -> adapted_couple (fun x : R => SF_sup_fun f a b n x) a b (seq2Rlist (unif_part b a n)) (seq2Rlist (behead (pairmap (fun x y : R => Sup_fct f x y) 0 (unif_part b a n)))))
last_unif_part : forall (x0 a b : R) (n : nat), last x0 (unif_part a b n) = b
head_unif_part : forall (x0 a b : R) (n : nat), head x0 (unif_part a b n) = a
antiderivative_P2 : forall (f F0 F1 : R -> R) (a b c : R), antiderivative f F0 a b -> antiderivative f F1 b c -> antiderivative f (fun x : R => if Rle_dec x b then F0 x else F1 x + (F0 b - F1 b)) a c
SF_sup_seq = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) => SF_seq_f2 (Sup_fct f) (unif_part a b n) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> nat -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
SF_inf_seq = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) => SF_seq_f2 (Inf_fct f) (unif_part a b n) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> nat -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
Sup_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => if Req_EM_T a b then Finite 0 else Lub_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Inf_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => if Req_EM_T a b then Finite 0 else Glb_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
primitive : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a <= x -> x <= b -> Riemann_integrable f a x) -> R -> R
SF_val_seq = fun (T : Type) (f : R -> T) (a b : R) (n : nat) => SF_seq_f2 (fun x y : R => f ((x + y) / 2)) (unif_part a b n) : forall T : Type, (R -> T) -> R -> R -> nat -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
StepFun_P2 : forall (a b : R) (f : R -> R) (l lf : Rlist), adapted_couple f a b l lf -> adapted_couple f b a l lf
fe : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R -> R
SF_val_fun = fun (T : Type) (f : R -> T) (a b : R) (n : nat) (x : R) => SF_fun_f2 (fun x0 y : R => f ((x0 + y) / 2)) (unif_part a b n) x : forall T : Type, (R -> T) -> R -> R -> nat -> R -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope R_scope]
RiemannInt : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> R
RiemannInt_SF : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R
SF_sup_fun_bound : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) (x : R), SF_sup_fun f a b n x = SF_sup_fun f b a n x
SF_inf_fun_bound : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) (x : R), SF_inf_fun f a b n x = SF_inf_fun f b a n x
mkStepFun : forall (a b : R) (fe : R -> R), IsStepFun fe a b -> StepFun a b
Rlt_Rminus : forall a b : R, a < b -> 0 < b - a
open_interval = fun a b x : R => a < x < b : R -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope R_scope]
Newton_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => {g : R -> R | antiderivative f g a b \/ antiderivative f g b a} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
subdivision_val : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> Rlist
Riemann_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
SF_sup_r : (R -> R) -> forall a b : R, nat -> StepFun a b
sf_SF_val_fun : (R -> R) -> forall a b : R, nat -> StepFun a b
StepFun_P29 : forall (a b : R) (f : StepFun a b), is_subdivision f a b (subdivision f)
SF_val_ly = fun (T : Type) (f : R -> T) (a b : R) (n : nat) => behead (pairmap (fun x y : R => f ((x + y) / 2)) 0 (unif_part a b n)) : forall T : Type, (R -> T) -> R -> R -> nat -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
StepFun_P1 : forall (a b : R) (f : StepFun a b), adapted_couple f a b (subdivision f) (subdivision_val f)
antiderivative = fun (f g : R -> R) (a b : R) => (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> exists pr : derivable_pt g x, f x = derive_pt g x pr) /\ a <= b : (R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope]
FTCN_step1 : forall (f : Differential) (a b : R), Newton_integrable (fun x : R => derive_pt f x (cond_diff f x)) a b

```coq
destruct (Rle_dec a b).
- rewrite -> SF_inf_subdiv. simpl. reflexivity.
- rewrite -> SF_inf_subdiv. simpl. reflexivity.
Qed.```
